rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0002
rows.name:
You defeated Thanatobeast
Andraz, didn't you?

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Please, tell me what happened,
in as much detail as you can!

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0005
rows.name:
So in the end, you were not
able to defeat it, but Yaegiri
smashed it high into the sky?

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, what good fortune I have today,
that I may have the honor to meet
such a mighty warrior as Yaegiri!

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0007
rows.name:
And His Highness Zeke and his
loyal cohorts as well, of course!

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0008
rows.name:
I will weave your tale into a ballad for
the ages! And I'll embellish the truth a
touch with a third and final verse.

rows.label: tlk44300181_03_msg0009
rows.name:
Let there be another legend
born today in Luxuria!
